nodes.text: Nab H'aas was a Bith Senator during the height of the Second Galactic Civil War. H'aas represented his homeworld in the Galactic Alliance Senate, and was a witness to the argument between Mara Jade Skywalker and Jacen Solo, along with fellow Bith Senator Ph'Olla regarding the security of Ben Skywalker. Galactic Alliance Guard Captain Lon Shevu received H'aas testimony of the event during the investigation into Mara's death.
